ISSUE.TITLE: "System Information" page. The dates for the assemblies are very strange and very different
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Visit "System -> System Information" page. The dates for the assemblies are very strange and very different i.e years could be 1969, 1909 etc. Microsoft.AspNetCore, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=adb9793829ddae60 Release C:\DEV\nopCommerce_4.0\Presentation\Nop.Web\bin\Debug\net461\Microsoft.AspNetCore.dll 1969-11-18T23:31:51 This is a bit confusing as most of us were not born in 1909 ;) Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/48672/nopcommerce-40-bug-fixes-and-improvements.aspx?p=2#193747

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #2547 Implemented deleting folders with locales (e.g. \en, \de) from plugins output

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #2594 System Information page. Fixed error on showing dates for the assemblies
